title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Language Education Simulation Through Activity-Based Learning Design Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can visually design language learning activities using DSML (Domain-Specific Modeling Language) icons.
Learners can improve activity models through peer assessment and feedback in a simulated environment.
Learners can apply activity-based learning design principles during VR-based language task performance.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
